name: Benjamin Rooster
description:
Can you imagine if Benjamin Button was a Rooster? Take a look on this game and check that by yourself!! Can you collect the magic corns to help him rewinds his lifetime?  Discover this alternative world here! Help Benjamin Rooster cross all the challenges and come safe to his nest.

Commands: 

•  Left and right arrow keys or A and D: Move the rooster;

• Spacebar: Rooster Special ability.

Made by MuSloth Studios

Pixel art by Mit Connors and Totoro


new levels coming after the jam's ending
